<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Storm Chair](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1164)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 91</row>

**Price** 4,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 3
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This traveler's chair uses magic and Stasian technology, storing up power in its Stasian coils to arc lightning through your foes and grant brief spurts of flight.

<document level="2" id="action-952" />

<document level="2" id="action-953" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
